scripts.test:ui: npx playwright test --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:ui:headless: npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:ui:chrome: npx playwright test --project=chromium --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:ui:chrome:headless: npx playwright test --project=chromium && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:ui:firefox: npx playwright test --project=firefox --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:ui:firefox:headless: npx playwright test --project=firefox && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:ui:allure: npx playwright test --reporter=line,allure-playwright && allure generate ./allure-results -o ./allure-report --clean && allure open ./allure-report
